title: What a boring experience!
review: This review will be short as I have noticed that other IMDb's have rightly slated IM3 in plenty detail! DO NOT SEE THIS FILM! Its dull, because of this, too long and ultimately very boring! If i could, I would have rated it -5/10! Critics rate this at an average of 7.8 on IMDb! Hopefully this review amongst the other true reflections will deter at least one person from seeing this intolerable droth and saving their money.I cant decide whats worse.....this or.......the last batman.O well tonight Mud will hopefully make up for it
